gen:link.msg:message: `ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingYearDisclosure` MUST NOT be reported, because the reported value of `OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference` is equal to `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingYearDisclosure')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingYearDisclosure return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingYearDisclosure` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference` is equal to `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU1_OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesChangeOfStatementPreviousReportingPeriodHousingDvi_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU1_OpeningClosingBalanceSheetDifference return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
